description._content:
This wedding photo comes from the Margaret Martin series in the PAX collection. Her collection includes primarily photographic prints, but also some letters documenting both her PAX service in Enkenbach, Germany and later missionary work with Eastern Mennonite Board of Missions. 

PAX refers to the program of alternative voluntary service coordinated by the Mennonite Central Committee from 1951 to 1976. PAX provided an opportunity for men and women to perform service abroad rather than serve in the United States Armed Forces.
Citation: PAX Collection, 1945-2005, Margaret Martin, 1945-1990 (HM1-927 Box 4 Folder 1). Mennonite Church USA Archives, Goshen, IN.
